name: Boris Yeltsin
bio:
Boris Yeltsin - President of Russia 🌟🇷🇺

Leading the charge for democracy & progress in the heart of the Soviet Union. Committed to building a brighter future for all Russians. #YeltsinForChange #90sRevolution 🚀🔴⚪️🔵

name: Cornel West
bio: Activist, author, and philosopher spreading truth and promoting justice in a world gone mad. #90sPhilosopher #CornelWest #StayWoke

name: Liz Phair
bio: '90s alt-rocker turned indie darling. Expletive-filled lyrics and unabashed honesty. #LizPhairIsBack #GirlySoundRevolution #ExileInGodmotherstown

name: Camille Paglia
bio: Provocative cultural theorist taking on gender, politics, and pop culture with a fierce pen. Love a good debate and a strong espresso. #90sIcon #IntellectualBadass

name: Terence McKenna
bio: Psychedelic visionary exploring the fringes of consciousness and culture. Author of "True Hallucinations" and "The Archaic Revival." #TimewaveZero #NoveltyTheory
